mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_file_msg ( file_id, file_type, file_name, file_path, file_statuss, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date ) VALUES ( #{fileId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileStatuss, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

INSERT INTO t_sys_file_msg ( file_id, file_type, file_name, file_path, file_statuss, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date ) VALUES
( #{item.fileId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.fileType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.filePath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fileStatuss, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_sys_file_msg SET file_type = #{fileType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_name = #{fileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_path = #{filePath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_statuss = #{fileStatuss, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_date = #{createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_date = #{updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE
AND file_id = #{fileId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

UPDATE t_sys_file_msg
file_type = #{fileType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_name = #{fileName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_path = #{filePath, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_statuss = #{fileStatuss, jdbcType=VARCHAR},

updated_by = #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT},
updated_date = #{updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE
AND file_id = #{fileId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

AND file_id = #{item.fileId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.sql: a.file_id, a.file_type, a.file_name, a.file_path, a.file_statuss, a.created_by, a.created_date, a.updated_by, a.updated_date
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_sys_file_msg a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.file_id = #{fileId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
select msg.file_path from t_sys_material_file tmf, t_sys_file_msg msg where tmf.file_id = msg.file_id and tmf.material_file_id = #{fileId}
